text: Dame Maureen Diane Lipman, (born 10 May 1946) is an English movie, theatre, radio and television actress, columnist and comedian. In recent years, she has become known for her role as Evelyn Plummer in the long-running ITV soap opera Coronation Street (2018â€“present). == Other websites == * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Knights and Dames Commander of the Order of the British Empire Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English radio actors Category:English stage actors Category:People from Kingston upon Hull Category:Actors from Yorkshire
title: Maureen Lipman
